ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers

Class GlobalStyleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller
      • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.GlobalStyleController

  • public class GlobalStyleController
extends Controller
    This class is responsible for controlling access to the global style.

    Eric Marinier
